```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(scales)
```

```{r data, }
end_times <- read_csv("../simulator/out.csv")
flows     <- read_csv("../simulator/flows.csv") %>%
    left_join(end_times, by = c("id" = "flow_id")) %>% 
    mutate(fct = time_ms - arrival)
```

```{r plots, options}
flows %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = size_bytes/1e6,
               y = fct)) +
    geom_point() +
    scale_x_log10(label = partial(comma, accuracy = .01), breaks = c(.01, .1, 1, 10, 100, 1000)) +
    scale_y_log10(label = partial(comma, accuracy = .001)) +
    theme_ipsum_rc() +
    labs(x = "Size (Mb)")
```
